content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING
This game contains: bright flashes of light and brown notes, obscenities, violence against voxel models, smoking, alcohol, drugs, blood, strong male friendship, pain, agony and many other things that can offend you.
Most likely this will happen, I would like to note that it is not my point of view that is popularized here, but a fictional character in a fictional world.
Any coincidence with someone and something, an accident, if something seemed to you, then it really seemed to you.
Everything that happens here is the easiest to describe with the word farce.
At the time of release, the content complies with the rules of the Twitch platform, the game can be streamed without fear.
